Posts.Content: Jan 7, 2013 12:47AM Colleenkelly wrote: How are you doing on the chemo? I meet with doctor tomorrow and will probably start chemo very soon. I am very scared of how I will react to it. Also, did you have any scans done to check for mets? Thinking about asking doctor to take some test. Hope you are doing well. Colleen
